amendment.description: To provide for Federal coordination of activities supporting sustainable chemistry, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1808 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1808 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Coons to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184) To provide for Federal coordination of activities supporting sustainable chemistry, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1808 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Coons to Amendment SA 2301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1808 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
